title: Cool Beans
description: Everything seems to be going perfectly for Maya She has a great job at a coffee shop, gets along with her parents, and is happily single. That is until her best friend starts dating Mayaâ€™s high school sweetheart.This funny, heartwarming fiction story by best-selling author Erynn Mangum uses the power of story to challenge teens to discover the relevance of faith in their relationships and their lives.
author: Erynn  Mangum
